description.ruby-sapphire:
A fast and unavoidable
electric attack.
description.emerald:
A fast and unavoidable
electric attack.
description.firered-leafgreen:
A rapid jolt of
electricity strikes
the foe. It can’t
be evaded.
description.diamond-pearl:
The user strikes the
foe with a quick jolt
of electricity.
This attack cannot be
evaded.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.
